verses.verse: Οἴδαμεν <WG1492> Oidamen we know ( Our Eternal Dwelling) γὰρ <WG1063> gar Now ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἐπίγειος <WG1919> epigeios earthly ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn we οἰκία <WG3614> oikia [live in] τοῦ <WG3588> tou the σκήνους <WG4636> skēnous tent καταλυθῇ <WG2647> katalythē is dismantled , οἰκοδομὴν <WG3619> oikodomēn a building ἐκ <WG1537> ek from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God , ἔχομεν <WG2192> echomen we have οἰκίαν <WG3614> oikian house ἀχειροποίητον <WG886> acheiropoiēton not built by human hands . αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion an eternal ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois - οὐρανοῖς <WG3772> ouranois heaven ,

καὶ <WG2532> kai - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἐν <WG1722> en in τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō this [tent] στενάζομεν <WG4727> stenazomen we groan , τὸ <WG3588> to - οἰκητήριον <WG3613> oikētērion dwelling , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our τὸ <WG3588> to vvv ἐξ <WG1537> ex vvv οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heavenly ἐπενδύσασθαι <WG1902> ependysasthai to be clothed with ἐπιποθοῦντες <WG1971> epipothountes longing

εἴ <WG1487> ei because γε <WG1065> ge . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ἐνδυσάμενοι <WG1746> endysamenoi when we are clothed , οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv γυμνοὶ <WG1131> gymnoi naked . εὑρεθησόμεθα <WG2147> heurethēsometha we will not be found

καὶ <WG2532> kai So γὰρ <WG1063> gar . . . οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ὄντες <WG1510> ontes [while] we are ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō [this] σκήνει <WG4636> skēnei tent , στενάζομεν <WG4727> stenazomen we groan βαρούμενοι <WG916> baroumenoi under our burdens , ἐφ’ <WG1909> eph’ because ᾧ <WG3739> hō . . . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θέλομεν <WG2309> thelomen we do not wish ἐκδύσασθαι <WG1562> ekdysasthai to be unclothed ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἐπενδύσασθαι <WG1902> ependysasthai clothed , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that καταποθῇ <WG2666> katapothē may be swallowed up τὸ <WG3588> to [our] θνητὸν <WG2349> thnēton mortality ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs life .

ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de And κατεργασάμενος <WG2716> katergasamenos has prepared ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us εἰς <WG1519> eis for αὐτὸ <WG846> auto very [purpose] τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this Θεός <WG2316> Theos God ὁ <WG3588> ho - δοὺς <WG1325> dous [and] has given ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἀρραβῶνα <WG728> arrabōna as a pledge of what is to come . τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit

Θαρροῦντες <WG2292> Tharrountes we are always confident , οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore πάντοτε <WG3842> pantote vvv καὶ <WG2532> kai although εἰδότες <WG1492> eidotes we know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐνδημοῦντες <WG1736> endēmountes while we are at home ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the σώματι <WG4983> sōmati body , ἐκδημοῦμεν <WG1553> ekdēmoumen we are away ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord .
διὰ <WG1223> dia by πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs faith , γὰρ <WG1063> gar For περιπατοῦμεν <WG4043> peripatoumen we walk οὐ <WG3756> ou not διὰ <WG1223> dia by εἴδους <WG1491> eidous sight .

Θαρροῦμεν <WG2292> Tharroumen We are confident , δὲ <WG1161> de then , καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐδοκοῦμεν <WG2106> eudokoumen would prefer μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon . . . ἐκδημῆσαι <WG1553> ekdēmēsai to be away ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the σώματος <WG4983> sōmatos body καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐνδημῆσαι <WG1736> endēmēsai at home πρὸς <WG4314> pros with τὸν <WG3588> ton the Κύριον <WG2962> Kyrion Lord .

διὸ <WG1352> dio So καὶ <WG2532> kai - φιλοτιμούμεθα <WG5389> philotimoumetha we aspire εἴτε <WG1535> eite whether ἐνδημοῦντες <WG1736> endēmountes we are here in this body εἴτε <WG1535> eite or ἐκδημοῦντες <WG1553> ekdēmountes away from it . εὐάρεστοι <WG2101> euarestoi please αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him , εἶναι <WG1510> einai to

τοὺς <WG3588> tous - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For πάντας <WG3956> pantas all ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas we φανερωθῆναι <WG5319> phanerōthēnai appear δεῖ <WG1163> dei must ἔμπροσθεν <WG1715> emprosthen before τοῦ <WG3588> tou the βήματος <WG968> bēmatos judgment seat τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ , ἵνα <WG2443> hina that κομίσηται <WG2865> komisētai may receive his due ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos each one τὰ <WG3588> ta - διὰ <WG1223> dia in τοῦ <WG3588> tou the σώματος <WG4983> sōmatos body , πρὸς <WG4314> pros for ἃ <WG3739> ha the things ἔπραξεν <WG4238> epraxen done εἴτε <WG1535> eite whether ἀγαθὸν <WG18> agathon good εἴτε <WG1535> eite or φαῦλον <WG5337> phaulon bad .

Εἰδότες <WG1492> Eidotes since we know ( Ambassadors for Christ) οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore , τὸν <WG3588> ton [what it means] φόβον <WG5401> phobon to fear τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord , ἀνθρώπους <WG444> anthrōpous men . πείθομεν <WG3982> peithomen we try to persuade Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō to God , δὲ <WG1161> de - πεφανερώμεθα <WG5319> pephanerōmetha What we are is clear ἐλπίζω <WG1679> elpizō I hope δὲ <WG1161> de and καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ἐν <WG1722> en to ταῖς <WG3588> tais - συνειδήσεσιν <WG4893> syneidēsesin conscience ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your πεφανερῶσθαι <WG5319> pephanerōsthai it is clear

οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv πάλιν <WG3825> palin again . ἑαυτοὺς <WG1438> heautous ourselves συνιστάνομεν <WG4921> synistanomen We are not commending ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla Instead , ἀφορμὴν <WG874> aphormēn an occasion διδόντες <WG1325> didontes we are giving ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you καυχήματος <WG2745> kauchēmatos to be proud ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper of ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn us , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ἔχητε <WG2192> echēte you can answer πρὸς <WG4314> pros . . . τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who ἐν <WG1722> en in προσώπῳ <WG4383> prosōpō appearances καυχωμένους <WG2744> kauchōmenous take pride καὶ <WG2532> kai [rather than] μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἐν <WG1722> en in καρδίᾳ <WG2588> kardia [the] heart .

Εἴτε <WG1535> Eite If γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἐξέστημεν <WG1839> exestēmen we are out of our mind , Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō [it is] for God ; εἴτε <WG1535> eite if σωφρονοῦμεν <WG4993> sōphronoumen we are of sound mind , ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin [it is] for you .

ἡ <WG3588> hē - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἀγάπη <WG26> agapē love τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ’s συνέχει <WG4912> synechei compels ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us , κρίναντας <WG2919> krinantas [because] we are convinced τοῦτο <WG3778> touto . . . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that εἷς <WG1520> heis One ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for πάντων <WG3956> pantōn all , ἀπέθανεν <WG599> apethanen died ἄρα <WG686> ara therefore οἱ <WG3588> hoi - πάντες <WG3956> pantes all ἀπέθανον <WG599> apethanon died .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for πάντων <WG3956> pantōn all , ἀπέθανεν <WG599> apethanen He died ἵνα <WG2443> hina that οἱ <WG3588> hoi those who ζῶντες <WG2198> zōntes live μηκέτι <WG3371> mēketi should no longer ἑαυτοῖς <WG1438> heautois for themselves , ζῶσιν <WG2198> zōsin live ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but τῷ <WG3588> tō for Him [who] ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them ἀποθανόντι <WG599> apothanonti died καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐγερθέντι <WG1453> egerthenti was raised again .

Ὥστε <WG5620> Hōste So ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - νῦν <WG3568> nyn now on οὐδένα <WG3762> oudena no one οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen regard κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [the] flesh . εἰ <WG1487> ei Although καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἐγνώκαμεν <WG1097> egnōkamen we once regarded κατὰ <WG2596> kata [in this way] σάρκα <WG4561> sarka . . . , Χριστόν <WG5547> Christon Christ ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla - νῦν <WG3568> nyn - οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi no longer . γινώσκομεν <WG1097> ginōskomen [we do so]

( Or a new creature) τὰ <WG3588> ta The ἀρχαῖα <WG744> archaia old παρῆλθεν <WG3928> parēlthen has passed away . ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou Behold , γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen has come ! καινά <WG2537> kaina [the] new

Τὰ <WG3588> Ta - δὲ <WG1161> de - πάντα <WG3956> panta All this [is] ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God , τοῦ <WG3588> tou who καταλλάξαντος <WG2644> katallaxantos reconciled ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō to Himself διὰ <WG1223> dia through Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ καὶ <WG2532> kai and δόντος <WG1325> dontos gave ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us τὴν <WG3588> tēn the διακονίαν <WG1248> diakonian ministry τῆς <WG3588> tēs - καταλλαγῆς <WG2643> katallagēs of reconciliation :

ὡς <WG5613> hōs - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ , κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon [the] world καταλλάσσων <WG2644> katallassōn reconciling ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō to Himself μὴ <WG3361> mē not λογιζόμενος <WG3049> logizomenos counting αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois against them . τὰ <WG3588> ta - παραπτώματα <WG3900> paraptōmata trespasses αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn [men’s] καὶ <WG2532> kai And θέμενος <WG5087> themenos He has committed ἐν <WG1722> en to ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us τὸν <WG3588> ton the λόγον <WG3056> logon message τῆς <WG3588> tēs - καταλλαγῆς <WG2643> katallagēs of reconciliation .

Ὑπὲρ <WG5228> Hyper for Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore πρεσβεύομεν <WG4243> presbeuomen we are ambassadors ὡς <WG5613> hōs as though τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God παρακαλοῦντος <WG3870> parakalountos were making His appeal δι’ <WG1223> di’ through ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn us . δεόμεθα <WG1189> deometha We implore you ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper on behalf Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ : καταλλάγητε <WG2644> katallagēte Be reconciled τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō to God .

τὸν <WG3588> ton Him who μὴ <WG3361> mē no γνόντα <WG1097> gnonta knew ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian sin ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper vvv ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn on our behalf , ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian [to be] sin ( Or a sin offering) ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen [God] made ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we γενώμεθα <WG1096> genōmetha might become δικαιοσύνη <WG1343> dikaiosynē [the] righteousness Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . ἐν <WG1722> en in αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him
